CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 59 The BHJ photoactive layer was prepared by spin - coating chlorobenzene solution of the polymer : PC71BM with weight ratio of 1 : 2 on the top of PEDOT : PSS layer without further treatment.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. PC71BM: This is the name of a specific polymer used in the BHJ photoactive layer.
2. PEDOT: This is the name of a specific conducting polymer used in the PEDOT : PSS layer.
3. PSS: This is the name of a specific polymer used in the PEDOT : PSS layer.

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. PC71BM
2. PEDOT
3. PSS
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph:

1. PC71BM

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. PC71BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PC71BM |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 59 The BHJ photoactive layer was prepared by spin - coating chlorobenzene solution of the polymer : PC71BM with weight ratio of 1 : 2 on the top of PEDOT : PSS layer without further treatment.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. PC71BM: This is a polymer material used in the preparation of the BHJ photoactive layer.
2. PEDOT : PSS: This is another material used in the preparation of the BHJ photoactive layer, specifically the PEDOT (poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene)) and PSS (polystyrene sulfonate) layers.

Note that these are the only two entities in the paragraph that are referred to by their full chemical names, rather than their common names or abbreviations.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties:

1. PC71BM: This is a polymer material used in the preparation of the BHJ photoactive layer.

I removed the following entities that do not refer to material properties:

* chlorobenzene (a solvent)
* spin-coating (a process)
* PEDOT : PSS (a mixture of materials)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PC71BM |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 59 The BHJ photoactive layer was prepared by spin - coating chlorobenzene solution of the polymer : PC71BM with weight ratio of 1 : 2 on the top of PEDOT : PSS layer without further treatment.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Value" entities:

1. PC71BM: This is a specific type of polymer with a weight ratio of 1 : 2 when used with chlorobenzene solution.
2. PEDOT : PSS: This is another specific type of material, likely a conducting polymer, used in combination with the PC71BM polymer.

Note that these are the only two entities in the paragraph that can be identified as "Property Value" entities, as they are both materials with specific properties that are relevant to the photoactive layer's preparation.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. PC71BM: This is a specific type of polymer with a weight ratio of 1 : 2 when used with chlorobenzene solution. The weight ratio refers to the value of the polymer's properties in terms of its concentration in the solution.
2. PEDOT : PSS: This is another specific type of material, likely a conducting polymer, used in combination with the PC71BM polymer. The combination of these materials refers to the value of their properties in terms of their ability to create a photoactive layer.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PC71BM (weight ratio of 1 : 2 with chlorobenzene solution) |
| PEDOT : PSS (combination of conducting polymers) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
